title: Love the convenience of all the sizes!
content: This is a great product and I'm very happy that Tampax has package these in three different sizes in one box. Depending on the day and flow I often need different sizes throughout the week and now I only have to buy one box because it has multiple sizes which is extremely convenient. Much better than having to take up the space of three boxes to get through the week . I am so thankful these are on the market so that I can save space in my closet and have multiple options throughout the week to fit my flow.
